original: -Map by Sea_Sedge-
zh_trans: 地图作者:Sea_Sedge海苔

original: -Ported by oVo-
zh_trans: -移植作者:oVo- （汉化:shootin stars）

original: ***The road will open in 25 seconds***
zh_trans: ***道路将在25秒后打开***

original: ***The road will open in 30 seconds***
zh_trans: ***道路将在30秒后打开***

original: ***zombie teleport in 5S***
zh_trans: ***僵尸在5秒后传送***

original: ***The castle will open in 20 seconds***
zh_trans: ***城堡将在20秒后打开***

original: ***The room will be open in 25 seconds***
zh_trans: ***这个房间将在25秒后打开***

original: Howdy,Frisk!
zh_trans: 花花:你好啊,弗里斯克!

original: You finally made it home.
zh_trans: 花花:你终于到家了

original: Remember when we used to play here?
zh_trans: 花花:还记得我们曾经在这里玩耍的时候吗?

original: Hee hee hee...
zh_trans: 花花:嘻嘻嘻……

original: Boy!
zh_trans: 花花:嘿,男孩!

original: Today's gonna be just as fun.
zh_trans: 花花:今天也会同样有趣.

original: I remember when I first woke up here,in the garden.
zh_trans: 花花:我记得当我第一次在这儿醒来的时候,是在花园里.

original: I was so scared.
zh_trans: 花花:我当时非常害怕.

original: I couldn't feel my arms or my legs...
zh_trans: 花花:我感觉不到我的胳膊和腿……

original: My entire body had turned into a flower!
zh_trans: 花花:我的整个身体都变成了一朵花。

original: Mom!Dad!Somebody help me!I called out.
zh_trans: 花花:爸!妈!谁来救救我!我大声呼救.

original: But nobody came.
zh_trans: 花花:但是没有人来.

original: ***There seems to be something in the kitchen***
zh_trans: ***厨房里似乎有什么东西***

original: Eventually,the king found me,crying in the garden.
zh_trans: 花花:最终,国王发现了我,我正在花园里哭泣.

original: I explained what had happened to him.
zh_trans: 花花:我向他解释了发生在我身上的事情。

original: Then he held me,Frisk.
zh_trans: 花花:然后他抱住了我,弗里斯克.

original: He held me with tears in his eyes,saying...
zh_trans: 花花:他眼中含着泪水抱住我,说道...

original: There,there.Everything is going to be alright.
zh_trans: 花花:好了,好了.一切都会好起来的.

original: He was so...Emotional.
zh_trans: 花花:他是那么…… 激动.

original: But...For some reason...
zh_trans: 花花:但是……出于某种原因……

original: I didn't feel anything at all.
zh_trans: 花花:我一点感觉都没有.

original: ***The stair chain has been opened.***
zh_trans: ***楼梯锁链已经被打开.***

original: I soon realized I didn't feel Anything about Anyone.
zh_trans: 花花:我很快意识到我对任何人都没有感觉.

original: My compassion had disappeared!
zh_trans: 花花:我的同情心消失了.

original: And believe me,it's not like I wasn't trying.
zh_trans: 花花:相信我,并不是我没有努力.

original: I wasted weeks with that stupid king,vainly hoping I would feel something.
zh_trans: 花花:我和那个愚蠢的国王一起浪费了几周的时间,徒劳地希望自己能有一些感觉.

original: But it became too much for me.
zh_trans: 花花:但是这对我来说太沉重了.

original: I ran away from home.Eventually,I reached the Ruins.Inside I found Her,Frisk.
zh_trans: 花花:我离家出走了.最终,我来到了遗迹.在里面,我找到了她,弗里斯克.

original: I thought of all people,She could make me feel whole again.She failed.Ha ha...
zh_trans: 花花:我曾以为在所有人当中,她能够让我再次找回完整的自我.可她失败了.哈哈……

original: I realized those two were useless.I became despondent.
zh_trans: 花花:我意识到那两个人毫无用处.我变得沮丧起来.

original: I just wanted to love someone.I just wanted to care about someone.
zh_trans: 花花:我只是想爱某个人.我只是想关心某个人.

original: Frisk,you might not believe this...But I decided...It wasn't worth living anymore.
zh_trans: 花花:弗里斯克,你可能不会相信这一点……但是我决定……不再值得活下去了.

original: Not in a world without love.Not in a world without you.
zh_trans: 花花:在一个没有爱的世界里不值得活下去.在一个没有你的世界里也不值得活下去.

original: So...I decided to follow in your footsteps.I would erase myself from existence.
zh_trans: 花花:所以…… 我决定追随你的脚步.我要将自己从存在中抹去.

original: And you know what?I succeeded.
zh_trans: 花花:你知道吗?我成功了.

original: It all started because I was curious.Curious what would happen if I killed them.
zh_trans: 花花:这一切都是因为我的好奇开始的,我好奇如果我杀了他们会发生什么.

original: I don't like this,I told myself.I'm just doing this because I have to know what happens.
zh_trans: 花花:我不喜欢这样,我告诉自己.我这么做只是因为我必须知道会发生什么.

original: Ha ha ha...What an excuse!You of all people must kniw how liberating it is to act this way.
zh_trans: 花花:哈哈哈哈……多么蹩脚的借口!在所有人当中,你一定知道以这种方式行动是多么的解脱.

original: At least we're better than those sickos that stand around and watch it happen...
zh_trans: 花花:至少我们比那些站在一旁看着事情发生的变态要好……

original: Those pathetic people that want to see it,but are too weak to do it themselves.
zh_trans: 花花:那些可悲的人想要看到这一切，却又太软弱而无法亲自去做。

original: I bet someone like that's watching right now,aren't they...?
zh_trans: 花花:我打赌现在就有那样的人在看着，不是吗……？

original: Nowadays,even that's grown tiring.You understand,Frisk.
zh_trans: 花花:如今，甚至连那样也变得令人厌倦了。你明白的，弗里斯克。

original: I've done everything this world has to offer.I've read every book.I've burned every book.
zh_trans: 花花:我已经做了这个世界所能提供的一切。我读过每一本书。我也烧毁了每一本书。

original: I've won every game.I've lost every game.I've appeased everyone.I've killed everyone.
zh_trans: 花花:我赢过每一场游戏。我输过每一场游戏。我安抚过每一个人。我杀死过每一个人。

original: Set of number's...Lines of dialogue...I've seen them all.
zh_trans: 花花:一组组数字……一行行对话……我都已经见识过了。

original: But you...You're different.I never could predict you,Frisk.
zh_trans: 花花:但是你……你是不同的。我永远无法预测你，弗里斯克。

original: When I saw you in the Ruins,I didn't recognize you.I thought I could frighten you,then steal your soul.I failed.
zh_trans: 花花:当我在遗迹中看到你时，我没有认出你。我以为我可以吓唬你，然后偷走你的灵魂。我失败了。

original: And when I tried to load my save file...It didn't work.
zh_trans: 花花:而当我试图加载我的存档文件时……它不起作用了。

original: Frisk...Your determination!Somehow,it's even greater than mine!
zh_trans: 花花:弗里斯克……你的决心！不知为何，它甚至比我的还要强大。

original: I just have one question for you,Frisk.How did you get back to the Ruins from here...?
zh_trans: 花花:我只有一个问题要问你，弗里斯克。你是如何从这里回到遗迹的……

original: ...wait,I know.She must have taken you when she left.
zh_trans: 花花:……等等，我知道了。她一定是在离开的时候带走了你。

original: And decided to give you a proper burial,rather than...Hanging out in the basement forever.
zh_trans: 花花:并且决定给你一个合适的葬礼，而不是……永远在地下室里闲逛。

original: ...but,why then...?What made you wake up?Did you hear me calling you...?
zh_trans: 花花:……但是，为什么呢……？是什么让你醒来？是你听到了我的呼唤吗……？

original: It doesn't matter now.I'm so tired of this,Frisk.
zh_trans: 花花:现在这都不重要了。我受够了这一切，弗里斯克。

original: I'm tired of all these people.I'm tired of all these places.I'm tired of being a flower.
zh_trans: 花花:我厌倦了所有这些人。我厌倦了所有这些地方。我厌倦了做一朵花。

original: Frisk.There's just one thing left I want to do.
zh_trans: 花花:弗里斯克。我只剩下一件事想做。

original: Let's finish what we started.Let's free everyone.
zh_trans: 花花:让我们完成我们开始的事情。让我们解放每一个人

original: Then...let's let them see what humanity is really like!
zh_trans: 花花:然后……让我们让他们看看人类真正的样子。

original: That despite it all...This world is still kill or be killed!!
zh_trans: 花花:尽管如此……这个世界仍然是要么杀人要么被杀！！

original: Then...?Well.I had...Been entertaining a few ways to use that power.
zh_trans: 花花:那么……？嗯。我曾经……一直在考虑几种使用那种力量的方法。

original: Hee hee hee...But seeing you here changed my mind.
zh_trans: 花花:嘻嘻嘻……但是看到你在这里改变了我的想法。

original: Frisk...I think if you're around...Just living in the surface world doedn't seem so bad.
zh_trans: 花花:弗里斯克……我想如果你在身边……仅仅生活在地表世界似乎也没那么糟糕。

original: We don't even need to leave to get them this time.The king has six of them locked away.
zh_trans: 花花:这次我们甚至不需要离开就能拿到它们。国王把其中六个锁了起来。

original: I've tried hundreds of ways to get him to show me them...But he just won't.
zh_trans: 花花:我已经尝试了数百种方法让他给我看那些东西……但他就是不愿意。

original: Frisk...I know he'll do it for you.
zh_trans: 花花:弗里斯克……我知道他会为你这么做。

original: Why am I telling you all of this?Frisk,I said it before.
zh_trans: 花花:我为什么要和你说这些呢？弗里斯克，我之前就说过

original: Even after all this time...You're still the only one that understands me.You won't give me any worthless pity!
zh_trans: 花花:即使过了这么久…… 你仍然是唯一理解我的人。你不会给我任何毫无价值的怜悯

original: Creatures like us...Wouldn't hesitate to kill each other if we got in each other's way.
zh_trans: 花花:像我们这样的生物……如果挡了彼此的路，会毫不犹豫地互相残杀。

original: So that's...So...that's...Why...
zh_trans: 花花:所以那就是…… 所以…… 那就是…… 为什么……

original: ...ha...ha......what's this......feeling?Why am I...Shaking?
zh_trans: 花花:……哈……哈……这是什么……感觉？为什么我……在颤抖？

original: Hey...Frisk...No hard feelings about back then,right?
zh_trans: 花花:嘿…… 弗里斯克…… 对于那时候的事别往心里去,好吗?

original: H-Hey,what are you doing!?B...back off!!
zh_trans: 花花:嘿！你在干什么！？退……退后！！

original: I...I've changed my mind about all this.This isn't a good idea anymore.
zh_trans: 花花:我……我已经改变了对这一切的想法.这不再是个好主意了.

original: Y-you should go back,Frisk.This place is fine the way it is!
zh_trans: 花花:你……你应该回去,弗里斯克.这个地方保持现状就很好!

original: S-s-stop making that creepy face!This isn't funny!You've got a sick sense of humor!
zh_trans: 花花:别……别再露出那副吓人的表情了!这一点都不好笑!你的幽默感真变态.

original: Heya.
zh_trans: Sans:嘿呀.

original: You've been busy,huh?
zh_trans: Sans:你一直很忙,是吧?

original: So,I've got a question for ya.
zh_trans: Sans:所以,我有个问题要问你.

original: Do you think even the worst person can change...?
zh_trans: Sans:你认为只要努力,任何人都能成为好人吗

original: Heh heh heh heh...
zh_trans: Sans:嘿嘿嘿嘿……

original: All right.
zh_trans: Sans:行吧(算了)

original: Well,here's a better question.
zh_trans: Sans:那么,我有个更好的问题

original: Do you wanna have a bad time?
zh_trans: Sans:你想遭遇最糟糕的事情吗?

original: Cause if you take another step forward...
zh_trans: Sans:不要再向前迈进半步了...

original: You are really not going to like what happens next.
zh_trans: Sans:否则接下来会发生的事,你可绝对不会喜欢.

original: welp.Sorry,old lady.
zh_trans: Sans:没办法呢.对不起了,阿姨.

original: This is why I never make promises.
zh_trans: Sans:这就是我从不作承诺的原因.

original: It's a beautiful day outside.
zh_trans: Sans:今天是美好的一天

original: On days like these,kids like you...
zh_trans: Sans:在这样的日子里,像你这样的家伙……

original: Birds are singing.Flowers are blooming...
zh_trans: Sans:花儿正在绽放,小鸟们也在欢唱

original: Should be burning in hell.
zh_trans: Sans:应该在地狱里燃烧

original: Huh.
zh_trans: Sans:呵.

original: Always wondered why people never use their strongest attack first.
zh_trans: Sans:我一直在想…… 为什么大家一开始不使用必杀技呢

original: What?You think I'm just gonna stand there and take it?
zh_trans: Sans:怎么着?你还真觉得我会站在那里乖乖承受?

original: Our reports showed a massive anomaly in the timespace continuum.
zh_trans: Sans:我们的报告显示,在时空连续区中,发生了大量异常.

original: Timelines jumping left and right stopping and starting...
zh_trans: Sans:时间线左右跳动,停止,旋即重启

original: Until suddenly,everything ends.
zh_trans: Sans:直至突然之间,一切戛然而止,

original: That's your fault,isn't it?
zh_trans: Sans:呵呵呵,这些都是你造成的.不是吗?

original: You can't understand how this feels.
zh_trans: Sans:你无法理解这种感受

original: Knowing that one day,without any warning...
zh_trans: Sans:要知道总有一天，在毫无征兆下

original: It's all going to be reset.
zh_trans: Sans:一切事物都会归于零点

original: Look.I gave up trying to go back a long time ago.
zh_trans: Sans:听着，我很早之前就放弃回去了

original: We'll just end up right back here,without any memory of it,right?
zh_trans: Sans:同样的，前往地上也对我也不再有吸引力了

original: To be blunt...
zh_trans: Sans:老实说...

original: It makes it kind of hard to give it my all.
zh_trans: Sans:这让我难以全力以赴.

original: ...or is that just a poor excuse for being lazy...?
zh_trans: Sans:又或许这只是个为我的懒惰开脱的拙劣借口...鬼才清楚?

original: All I know is...seeing what comes next...
zh_trans: Sans:我所清楚的只有...一想到接下来...将会发生的事情...

original: I can't afford not to care anymore.
zh_trans: Sans:我就再也不能视而不见了

original: ***The door will close in 10 seconds***
zh_trans: ***大门将在10秒后打开***

original: ***Human victory***
zh_trans: ***人类胜利***

original: -Thanks for playing this map-
zh_trans: -谢谢你游玩这张地图-

original: ***Monster detected, level failed***
zh_trans: ***检测到有怪物,关卡失败***

original: **Loading RTV**
zh_trans: ***正在载入 RTV***

original: **Loading Lv1**
